issue.title: The CommonReference requirement of concept SwappableWith is not satisfied in the example

discussion.p: The defect stems from the example found in sub-clause p5:
The call to value_swap(a1, proxy(a2)) resolves to [T = N::A&, U = N::Proxy] The compiler will issue a diagnostic for #1 because:

li.p: concept SwappableWith<T, U> requires N::A and Proxy to model CommonReference<const remove_reference_t<T>&, const remove_reference_t<U>&> It follows from the example that there is no common reference for [T = N::A&, U = N::Proxy]

resolution.p: This wording is relative to N4791.
